page.title: 05Why I Like Potters Bar
page.content: Potters Bar is a very nice place it has plenty of shops. We have a swimming pool called Potters Bar swimming pool.It is quite a nice pool for it has a tennis club and a squash club and they are building a weight room.They have nearly finshed it.There is also a cricket club also called Potters Bar cricket club and opposite the cricket club there is a tennis club.I live in Byng Drive it is a very nice road and most of the houses are bungalows but have had extensions giving them upstairs. We are very lucky because we are near most of the everyday shops. Potters Bar has a lot of very nice schools and a lot of very nice secondary schools.
